weka.attributeSelection
Class TSARSearch

java.lang.Object
  weka.attributeSelection.ASSearch
      weka.attributeSelection.TSARSearch
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler, TechnicalInformationHandler
public class TSARSearch
extends ASSearch
implements OptionHandler, TechnicalInformationHandler

Class for performing the TabuSearch method.

Valid options are:

-Z
Specify the number of elite reducts in all the trials generated.

-T
number of tabu solution (default = 5)

-I
maximum number of iteration (default = 100)

-J
maximum number of consecutive iteration without improving (default = 40)

-K
maximum number of consecutive iteration without improving to apply shaking (default = 20)

-L
maximum number of consecutive iteration without improving to apply diversification (default = 20)

-F
wether generate the initial solution randomly or based on a selector (default = true).

-S
Seed for genering random numbers in the initial solution step (default = 1).

-P
probability of activate an attribute in the initial solution (default = 0.5).

-A
Evaluator used for finding the initial solution (used if -F = false)

-B
Search Strategy used for finding the initial solution (used if -F = false)

-N
number of neighborhood to generate

-C
Seed for genering random neighbours in the trial generation step (default = 1).

-D
Seed for genering random solutions in the diverse solutions generation step (default = 1).

-V
verbose (default = false).

from the Book: Tabu Search for Attribute Reduction in Rough Set Theory, Abdel-Rahman Hedar, Jue Wangy, and Masao Fukushima.

Author:
Adrian Pino (apinoa@facinf.uho.edu.cu)
See Also:

listOptions

public java.util.Enumeration listOptions()
Specified by:
listOptions in interface OptionHandler

setOptions

public void setOptions(java.lang.String[] options)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Parses a given list of options. Valid options are:

-T
number of tabu solution (default = 5)

-I
maximum number of iteration (default = 100)

-J
maximum number of consecutive iteration without improving (default = 40)

-K
maximum number of consecutive iteration without improving to apply shaking (default = 20)

-L
maximum number of consecutive iteration without improving to apply diversification (default = 20)

-F
wether generate the initial solution randomly or based on a selector (default = true).

-S
Seed for genering random numbers in the initial solution step (default = 1).

-P
probability of activate an attribute in the initial solution (default = 0.5).

-A
Evaluator used for finding the initial solution (used if -F = false)

-B
Search Strategy used for finding the initial solution (used if -F = false)

-N
number of neighborhood to generate

-C
Seed for generating random neighbours in the trial generation step (default = 1).

-D
Seed for generating random solutions in the diverse solutions generation step (default = 1).

-Z
Specify the number of elite reducts in all the trials generated.

-V
verbose (default = false).

Specified by:
setOptions in interface OptionHandler
Parameters:
options - the list of options as an array of strings
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an option is not supported

getOptions

public java.lang.String[] getOptions()
Gets the current settings of TSARSearch.

Specified by:
getOptions in interface OptionHandler
Returns:
an array of strings suitable for passing to setOptions()
